column4: Hi, anyone please could help me with smb.conf? I just want to share certain folder over LAN, but to enter it id liket hat user need to enter login/passwd?
first, you'll need to create that user on the host.
it's just as easy w/o a GUI
ok crating user is pretty easy
ok, so first create a user
sudo smbpasswd -L -a username    (you'll be asked to enter and confirm a password for the user)
sudo smbpasswd -L -e username    this will add the user to the samba group
now.... sudo nano /etc/samba/smb.conf  (that should open up your samba configuration file)
scroll to the very bottom, and add this (be sure to change the username, and set the description name.. to keep it simple, don't use spaces in the description name)...   http://pastebin.com/txTMNB9H
